translations: n.[植]被子植物（angiosperm 的复数）

phrs.translation: 被子植物, 被子植物分支, 被子植物门, 被子动物

sentences.sentence: Grasses are simple forms of angiosperms that bear their encapsulated seeds on long stalks.
sentences.translation: 草是被子植物的简单形态，种子被包裹在长茎上。

sentences.sentence: In a surprisingly short time, angiosperms filled many of the land areas on Hawaii that had been bare.
sentences.translation: 在很短的时间内，被子植物就覆盖了夏威夷许多原本光秃秃的土地。

sentences.sentence: Advance in polyembryonic seedling (PS) in angiosperms is summarized in the paper.
sentences.translation: 本文综述了被子植物多胚苗的研究进展。
